text: Hagi ama ana maka sondia vahe'mo'zama ha'zazminema eri'za e'nazana magoke antahi'zante e'naze. E'i ana antahi'zana Devitima kini azeri oti'nageno maka Israeli vahe'ma kegavama hania antahizante Hebroni kumatera e'naze. Anahukna hu'za maka vahe'mo'za Israeli kinia Deviti manisie hu'za antahi'naze.
